item.title: Supporting CVSS V4 score for CVE for Enhanced Vulnerability Assessment
item.description: Why transition to CVSS v4? The Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) is the global standard for assessing vulnerability severity. As leading institutions like the National Vulnerability Database (NVD) transition to CVSS v4, Microsoft is embracing this enhanced scoring model to ensure better alignment and more actionable insights. CVSS v4 addresses the limitations of its predecessor, CVSS v3, introducing features that provide a more granular and accurate assessment of vulnerabilities.
